item.title: Moparscape Classic - Server Settings
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:164, topic:392888”][quote author=waj link=topic=490060.msg3887351#msg3887351 date=1326560846]
-Also I don’t see why everyone think’s RSCAngel’s combat system/formulae what ever you guys call it, is the best around? It maybe one of the best, but its still crap and one needs to be re-done IMO.
[/quote]

The code is open source, and we are more than willing to accept patches, go ahead and re-do it better please.

XP rate will be no more than 2X, at least to begin with. The way I look at it, it can be fairly raised later, but it wouldn’t be too fair to lower it. So start low with an option to go higher later.[/quote]
Wise words from a wise man as one would say.

The combat formulae would need 1-2 people who will commit to trying to replicate it to RSC’s or at least just get it past what every other server has, and there is not many who will commit to one small project until finished.

People around here tend to give up too easy.

Read full topic

-Also I don’t see why everyone think’s RSCAngel’s combat system/formulae what ever you guys call it, is the best around? It maybe one of the best, but its still crap and one needs to be re-done IMO.

The code is open source, and we are more than willing to accept patches, go ahead and re-do it better please.

XP rate will be no more than 2X, at least to begin with. The way I look at it, it can be fairly raised later, but it wouldn’t be too fair to lower it. So start low with an option to go higher later.

so how can we have more than 1 char and will they b able to be on at same time? i think every1 will b making a couple afkers n a skiller and if it does get big ppl will want like 7 chars… classic was all about pkin on different lvls i for 1 had a lvl 10 mage a 30 mage 30 fighter 24 fighter 50 pker 80ish pker a main pker and a skiller thats 8 chars right there

so how can we have more than 1 char and will they b able to be on at same time?
